pages.text: Welcome to the Age of Metals! Well, don't expect anything too fancy yet, because you can only start with copper, and maybe some tin.
pages.title: Mining Ores

pages.text: You can mine these malachite and cassiterite ores with your flint pickaxe, but it would be faster with a stone one.
pages.title: Resources Around You

pages.text: Malachite is a green-ish ore, which is the mineral form of the well known copper; And there is cassiterite which is a blue-ish light-gray ore, alias tin.
pages.title: Some facts
